issue.title: www.tsb.co.uk
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.tsb.co.uk](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tsb.co.uk) ### Comment > With AdGuard Cookie Banners filter enabled, the page doesn't show the cookie banner, but there's no scrollbar, therefore unable to view the content of any page on tsb.co.uk. With AdGuard disabled, the cookie banner is displayed, and once accepted or declined, the pages have a scrollbar. ``` Username: @XChrispy ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/euc722zmpbsw48k44ss840ccsso44o02e4gpc9zxws.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/eob9tkfakxkwc8o4o0wkg0g8og4w4gsiuftsn9od80.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/hieracrl0uo8sscs8wk4g8cog8wscs4823lt3nietc.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.124 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled

The issue will not be handled because count of its visitor is too low.

issue.title: www.khou.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.khou.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.khou.com%2F) ### Comment > This problem occurs on ANY website that uses the Admiral ad block recovery plugin which is many media and newspaper websites. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/iqk1dgwm17kg4008k4wcsc4k4okk88k85ncfvmkicg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/2fy9w8nbi8lcko84okk8kokkkosk8cg1brkjouzt01.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.10 System version: | `Android 15` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js`
`https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/disable-amp/1.0/disable-amp.meta.js` Other extensions used: | `None`
